messages.content:
Can you help me figure out how to respond to judy to encourage her to update her review without being pushy?

here's the series of conversations starting with her review on etsy:
Review: 2/5 stars
The product arrived good. But the fragrance is not what I have in mind.

Judy! sorry to hear that, we know it's quite hard to buy oils without smelling them first and I believe that you purchased before we made the opportunity of purchasing samples. I am sending you a 50% refund to help make your experience with us better. We want to make it easy and fun to shop with us - even when you have to shop "smell blind"! Please let me know if we can make your experience better and if you like our shop, an updated review helps others know about your experience!
Date:
10 hours ago 9:12pm EDT
Judy Tsao Message:Thank you. Really appreciate the customer service.
Date:
5 hours ago

She seemed to appreciate us yet she didn't update the review, maybe we can remind her it's possible to update? What do you think is a nice non pushy response

Hello Judy,

I'm thrilled to hear that you appreciated our customer service and efforts to improve your experience. We deeply value your opinion as it helps us to continue improving.

Many customers might not be aware that Etsy allows for review updates at any time, and your updated review could really help us out. If you feel our response and actions have improved your overall experience with our shop, we'd greatly appreciate if you could take a few minutes to update your review. It helps us grow and provide better service to our customers.

Again, no pressure at all. We appreciate your time and are here if you need anything else.

Best regards, [Your Name]
Less thrilled, more modest and kind and sweet

Dear Judy,

It warms my heart to know you appreciated the steps we took to make your shopping experience better. We always aim to ensure our customers feel valued and heard.

You may not be aware, and this is in no way a necessity, but Etsy does allow you to update your review if your feelings about your experience change. If you feel that our response has positively impacted your initial impressions, we'd be truly grateful if you could consider updating your review. This could help future customers make informed decisions.

But please don't feel obligated to do so - we genuinely appreciate the time you've taken to engage with us and your overall support of our store.

Thank you once again, Judy. If you need anything else, feel free to reach out. 

Best wishes, 
[Your Name]
Make it a fun professional etsy message that's a bit shorter

Hi Judy,

Glad to hear our customer service hit the right note! Just a sweet little FYI - Etsy lets you tweak your reviews anytime you like. If our efforts added some sparkle to your experience and you're feeling up to it, we'd love to see your review reflect this. It helps our little shop keep growing.

No pressure, though! You being a part of our Etsy journey is reward enough.

Reach out anytime,
[Your Name]
fyi and tweak might be to coloquial she might not understand

Hi Judy,

It's wonderful to hear you've appreciated our customer service. As a friendly reminder, Etsy allows you to modify your reviews anytime. If our actions have brightened your shopping experience, and you'd like to share that, updating your review would mean a lot to us and our community.

But please, only if you feel comfortable doing so! Your satisfaction is our main reward.

Feel free to reach out anytime,
[Your Name]
